definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited

pinyin: ren2 lei4 mian3 yi4 que1 xian4 bing4 du2
fang4 she4 mian3 yi4 ce4 ding4
zi4 ti3 mian3 yi4 ji2 bing4

sentences.english: Objective To observe and explore the effect of activating the spleen for the immune function of spleen deficiency rat.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討運脾治療對脾虛大鼠免疫功能的作用。

sentences.english: The protein expression of TLR2 in the liver was detected by immunohistochemistry.
sentences.chinese: 免疫組織化學觀察肝組織TLR2蛋白的表達。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The Tongbi capsule has inhibitory effect on acute and immune inflammation.
sentences.chinese: 通鼻膠囊具有對抗急性及免疫性炎症的作用。

sentences.english: Or, you can see them as the body's natural defense system.
sentences.chinese: 不過你也可以把它們看成是身體的自然免疫系統。

sentences.english: The pulmonary vasculitis and Raynaud phenomenon might be related to immunologic abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 認爲肺血管的病變及雷諾現象可能與免疫異常有關。

sentences.english: Immunohistochemistry showed that ERK protein were mainly located in cytoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 免疫組織化學顯示ERK蛋白主要位於細胞漿內。

sentences.english: Some specialized immunochemical procedures are dealt with only briefly.
sentences.chinese: 一些專門的免疫化學方法只作簡略地介紹。

sentences.english: The immunity serum titer was mensurated by the routine ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 常規ELISA法測定免疫血清效價。

sentences.english: Total serum testosterone was assayed by Chemoluminescence immunoassay.
sentences.chinese: 化學發光免疫分析法測血清總睾酮。

sentences.english: Therefore we establish the gold immunochromatography assay (GICA) screening method.
sentences.chinese: 因此建立膠體金免疫層析快速篩選法。

sentences.english: At present it mainly contains anti-inflammatory and immune regulation in the treatment of UC.
sentences.chinese: 目前UC的治療以抗炎和調節免疫反應爲主。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of marine algal polysaccharide on immune function of irradiated mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察海藻多糖對輻射損傷小鼠免疫功能的影響。

sentences.english: The pathogenesis of this multicentric disorder may be associated with autoimmune disease.
sentences.chinese: 它的多器官受累可能與自身免疫疾病的發病機制相似。

sentences.english: HIV stands for human immunodeficiency virus.
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病病毒是指人體免疫缺損病毒。

sentences.english: Department of Rheumatology, Section for Climate Therapy, Oslo University Hospital, Oslo, Norway.
sentences.chinese: 挪威奧斯陸大學醫院，氣候療法部，風溼免疫科。

sentences.english: Biotic immune system is a highly complex system of distribution and self-adaptation.
sentences.chinese: 生物免疫系統是一個高度複雜的分佈協調自適應系統。
